summary: This mod adds morning fogs in some locations of Skyrim. Please read the description
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t94iid68u93u5py/manny.png?dl=1&token_hash=AAEIEPhxKj2lO3-1wXsAl9Vypgf6k4TsVc3sxuYWQTLS1Q[/img]
[img]http://s9.postimage.org/esuclhgrz/Copertina.jpg[/img]

[youtube]5Wbxp_Si9IM[/youtube][youtube]-sFAFiGj37g[/youtube][youtube]Hh8dVWvkZPE[/youtube]

[url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge.png[/img][/url]
[/center]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod adds morning fogs to these location:

- Docks of Solitude, Riften, Windhelm and Dawnstar
- Riverwood, Ivarstead, Half Moon Mill, Markarth, Dragonbridge and Mara's Eye Pond.

You can see these fogs from 4am to 7am of every day!

[center]
[img]http://s9.postimage.org/q4671c2en/z01.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s18.postimage.org/8il126wq1/z02.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s7.postimage.org/bg9vhd7qz/z03.jpg[/img]
[/center]

* COMPATIBILITY *

[size=5]FULLY COMPATIBLE WITH MY "SUPREME AND VOLUMETRIC FOG V2.0" MOD![/size]

This mod will be compatible every mod including environmental mods like RCRN and Climates of Tamriel.
Just place at bottom order loading.

* ALTERNATIVE VERSION BY EGOCARIB *

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50418]Morning Fogs Refined[/url]

* INSTALL *
Unpack, activate it by the Menu Launcher and enjoy!

* UNINSTALL *
Just delete the ESP and BSA

* FACEBOOK *
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/n9akaou1t/image.png[/img] [url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods]Join me on Facebook[/url]

* BUGS *
Please report to me any bugs
author: MannyGT

files.name: Morning Fogs
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the clipping volumetric fog textures issue to RIverwood
Added morning fogs to Dragonbridge location
